amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds used to enforce the rule entitled "Oil and Natural Gas Sector: Emission Standards for New, Reconstructed, and Modified Sources".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 147 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the use of funds used to enforce the rule entitled Oil and Natural Gas Sector: Emission Standards for New, Reconstructed, and Modified Sources.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 241 (Roll no. 385).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 241 (Roll no. 385).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A056) offered by Mr. Mullin.
